name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Integration Engineer with over 10 years of experience in designing and delivering backend systems, particularly for financial platforms and cloud-native architectures. Proficient in **Kubernetes**, **OpenShift**, and **OpenStack**, as well as networking protocols such as **TCP**, **IPSEC**, **DNS**, and **DIAMETER**. Strong skills in troubleshooting, documentation, and agile methodologies, complemented by a comprehensive understanding of EPC and 5GC systems. Successfully developed high-performing APIs and automation tools using **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask) and deployed services on **AWS** and **Azure**. Demonstrated history of delivering impactful projects at organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.
